channel.title: Marketing System
channel.description:
Yes i no the idea is already out there. but i am proving RSCE wrong when they say they see no point in this at all, when you are trying to make a replica rsc, here is the thing mate. If people wanted to play a server what is just like rsc. they will play rsc. (RSCA idea for this shows they think out of the box reason why they actually have more users (y)).
Anyway ideas:
[ul][li]User is allowed to select items to be sold from the website, allowing a certain price the users are able to buy it for. (Auto Buy), and also there is a system what allows you to message the user about this certain item if you want to try get it lower.[/li] [li]The buyer does not get the money sent to his bank account, but it gets sent as a private message ingame and on forums showing someone has bought this item. and u have a option of getting the money put in your bank. or store it till a later date[/li][/ul]
Anyway that is all the ideas i have actually got for this at the time, if you got any suggestions just leave it here
Progress: Finding Items you may sell in the market. (Yea i no i need to do ucfirst()) lol :p [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/vmyvj7.png[/img] Got to fix some stuff with buying and selling [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2whfrc2.png[/img]

item.title: Marketing System
item.dc:creator: @Stork Stork
item.description:
@Stork wrote:

I like this idea, but I dunno about the PM system. The idea of a marketplace is that it’s automatic - if a nigga wants to sell something via PM he can make a forum post.

I’d imagine some kind of ebay system where you put an item up for sale with reserve price, quantity, etc on some site and if a player wins the bid the goods are exchanged automatically.

Read full topic
